mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVAL VALUES(SEQ_APP.NEXTVAL, SEQ_DOC.CURRVAL, #{memNum}, #{appLevel}, NULL, #{appStatus}, NULL)
mapper.select: WITH A AS(SELECT BREAK_TOTAL, MEMBER_NUM FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum}) , B AS(SELECT SUM(LEAVE_APPLY) AS LEAVE_LEFT, MEM_NUM FROM APP_DOC WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memberNum} AND FORM_NO = 3 AND LEAVE_TYPE IN('연차', '반차') AND SUBSTR(DOC_DATE, 1, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND DOC_STATUS != '임시' GROUP BY MEM_NUM) SELECT A.BREAK_TOTAL - B.LEAVE_LEFT AS LEAVE_LEFT FROM A JOIN B ON MEMBER_NUM = MEM_NUM

SELECT DOC_DATE, FORM_NAME, DOC_TITLE, DOC_NO, DOC_STATUS FROM APP_DOC JOIN APP_FORM ON APP_FORM.FORM_NO = APP_DOC.FORM_NO WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum}
AND DOC_STATUS = '${docStatus}'
AND DOC_STATUS != '임시'
ORDER BY DOC_NO DESC

SELECT DOC_DATE, FORM_NAME, DOC_TITLE, DOC_NO, DOC_STATUS FROM APP_DOC JOIN APP_FORM ON APP_FORM.FORM_NO = APP_DOC.FORM_NO WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memberNum} AND DOC_STATUS != '임시'
AND DOC_DATE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND FORM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DOC_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DOC_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND (DOC_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR DOC_DATE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR FORM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR DOC_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%')
ORDER BY DOC_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APP_DOC JOIN APP_FORM ON APP_FORM.FORM_NO = APP_DOC.FORM_NO WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memberNum} AND DOC_STATUS != '임시'
AND DOC_DATE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND FORM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DOC_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DOC_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND (DOC_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR DOC_DATE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR FORM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR DOC_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%')

SELECT DOC_NO, MEM_NUM, MEMBER_NAME, FORM_NAME, DOC_TITLE, DOC_CONTENT, DOC_STATUS, DOC_DATE, LEAVE_TYPE, LEAVE_START, LEAVE_END, LEAVE_TIME, LEAVE_DAY, LEAVE_LEFT, LEAVE_APPLY FROM APP_DOC JOIN APP_FORM ON APP_FORM.FORM_NO = APP_DOC.FORM_NO JOIN MEMBER ON MEM_NUM = MEMBER_NUM WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo}

SELECT APP_NO, DOC_NO, MEM_NUM, MEMBER_NAME, DIV_NAME, RANK, APP_LEVEL, APP_DATE, APP_STATUS, REJ_REASON FROM APPROVAL JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER_NUM = MEM_NUM JOIN DIVISION ON DIVISION = DIV_CODE WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo} ORDER BY APP_LEVEL
SELECT REF_NO, DOC_NO, MEM_NUM, MEMBER_NAME, DIV_NAME, RANK, REF_STATUS FROM APP_REF JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER_NUM = MEM_NUM JOIN DIVISION ON DIVISION = DIV_CODE WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo} ORDER BY REF_NO
